configs.author: Mozilla Foundation
configs.name: Firefox Klar (stable)
configs.additionalSettings: {"intermediateLink":[{"customLinkFilterRegex":"[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.?[0-9]*/$","filterByLinkText":false,"skipSort":false,"reverseSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":true},{"customLinkFilterRegex":"android/$","filterByLinkText":false,"skipSort":false,"reverseSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false},{"customLinkFilterRegex":"klar-[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.?[0-9]*-android-arm64-v8a/$","filterByLinkText":false,"skipSort":false,"reverseSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false}],"customLinkFilterRegex":"klar-[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.?[0-9]*\\.multi\\.android-arm64-v8a\\.apk","filterByLinkText":false,"skipSort":false,"reverseSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false,"versionExtractWholePage":false,"requestHeader":[{"requestHeader":"User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/114.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36"}],"defaultPseudoVersioningMethod":"APKLinkHash","trackOnly":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.?[0-9]*","matchGroupToUse":"","versionDetection":false,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"apkFilterRegEx":"","invertAPKFilter":false,"autoApkFilterByArch":true,"appName":"","shizukuPretendToBeGooglePlay":false,"allowInsecure":false,"exemptFromBackgroundUpdates":false,"skipUpdateNotifications":false,"about":"","refreshBeforeDownload":false}

description.en: Stable channel of the Gecko-based Firefox Klar browser.
description.de: Stabile Variante des auf Gecko-Basis basierenden Browsers Firefox Klar.
